papers.title: On the Hardness of the NTRU Problem
papers.authors: Alice Pellet-Mary, Damien Stehlé
papers.abstract: The 25 year-old NTRU problem is an important computational assumption in public-key cryptography. However, from a reduction perspective, its relative hardness compared to other problems on Euclidean lattices is not well-understood. Its decision version reduces to the search Ring-LWE problem, but this only provides a hardness upper bound. We provide two answers to the long-standing open problem of providing reduction-based evidence of the hardness of the NTRU problem. First, we reduce the worst-case approximate Shortest Vector Problem over ideal lattices to an average-case search variant of the NTRU problem. Second, we reduce another average-case search variant of the NTRU problem to the decision NTRU problem.
papers.abstract_zh: 历时25年的NTRU问题是公钥密码学中一个重要的计算假设。然而，从归约的角度来看，与欧几里得格上的其他问题相比，它的相对难度还没有被很好地理解。其决策版本归结为搜索环-LWE问题，但这仅提供一个硬度上界。我们提供了两个答案来解决长期存在的问题，即提供基于还原的NTRU难题的证据。首先，我们将理想格上最坏情况下的近似最短向量问题简化为NTRU问题的平均情况搜索变体。其次，我们把NTRU问题的另一个平均情况搜索变型简化为决策NTRU问题。
papers.title_zh: NTRU问题的艰巨性

papers.title: A Formula for Disaster: A Unified Approach to Elliptic Curve Special-Point-Based Attacks
papers.authors: Vladimir Sedlacek, Jesús-Javier Chi-Domínguez, Jan Jancar, Billy Bob Brumley
papers.abstract: . The Reﬁned Power Analysis, Zero-Value Point, and Exceptional Procedure attacks introduced side-channel techniques against speciﬁc cases of elliptic curve cryptography. The three attacks recover bits of a static ECDH key adaptively, collecting information on whether a certain multiple of the input point was computed. We unify and generalize these attacks in a common framework, and solve the corresponding problem for a broader class of inputs. We also introduce a version of the attack against windowed scalar multiplication methods, recovering the full scalar instead of just a part of it. Finally, we systematically analyze elliptic curve point addition formulas from the Explicit-Formulas Database, classify all non-trivial exceptional points, and ﬁnd them in new formulas. These results indicate the usefulness of our tooling, which we released publicly, for unrolling formulas and ﬁnding special points, and potentially for independent future work.
papers.abstract_zh: 。定义的功耗分析、零值点和异常程序攻击引入了针对椭圆曲线加密特定情况的旁道技术。这三种攻击自适应地恢复静态ECDH密钥的位，收集关于是否计算了输入点的某个倍数的信息。我们在一个公共框架中统一和概括了这些攻击，并为更广泛的输入类解决了相应的问题。我们还介绍了一种针对窗口标量乘法方法的攻击版本，恢复全部标量而不仅仅是一部分。最后，我们系统地分析了显式公式数据库中的椭圆曲线点加法公式，对所有非平凡异常点进行了分类，并在新公式中找到它们。这些结果表明，我们公开发布的工具对于展开公式和寻找特殊点是有用的，对于独立的未来工作也是潜在的。

papers.title: Automatic Classical and Quantum Rebound Attacks on AES-Like Hashing by Exploiting Related-Key Differentials
papers.authors: Xiaoyang Dong, Zhiyu Zhang, Siwei Sun, Congming Wei, Xiaoyun Wang, Lei Hu
papers.abstract: Collision attacks on AES-like hashing (hash functions constructed by plugging AES-like ciphers or permutations into the famous PGV modes or their variants) can be reduced to the problem of finding a pair of inputs respecting a differential of the underlying AES-like primitive whose input and output differences are the same. The rebound attack due to Mendel et al. is a powerful tool for achieving this goal, whose quantum version was first considered by Hosoyamada and Sasaki at EUROCRYPT 2020. In this work, we automate the process of searching for the configurations of rebound attacks by taking related-key differentials of the underlying block cipher into account with the MILPbased approach. In the quantum setting, our model guide the search towards characteristics that minimize the resources (e.g., QRAM) and complexities of the resulting rebound attacks. We apply our method to Saturnin-hash, SKINNY, and Whirlpool and improved results are obtained.
papers.abstract_zh: 对类似AES的散列(通过将类似AES的密码或置换插入著名的PGV模式或它们的变体中而构造的散列函数)的冲突攻击可以被简化为寻找一对输入的问题，该对输入涉及其输入和输出差异相同的基础类似AES的原语的差异。由于Mendel等人的反弹攻击是实现这一目标的有力工具，其量子版本首先由Hosoyamada和Sasaki在EUROCRYPT 2020上考虑。在这项工作中，我们通过使用基于milp的方法将底层分组密码的相关密钥差分考虑在内，使搜索反弹攻击配置的过程自动化。在量子设置中，我们的模型引导搜索向最小化资源(例如，QRAM)和由此产生的反弹攻击的复杂性的特征。我们将我们的方法应用于Saturnin-hash、SKINNY和Whirlpool，并获得了改进的结果。
papers.title_zh: 利用相关密钥差分对AES-Like哈希的自动经典和量子反弹攻击

papers.title: Clustering Effect in Simon and Simeck
papers.authors: Gaëtan Leurent, Clara Pernot, André Schrottenloher
papers.abstract: Simon and Simeck are two lightweight block ciphers with a simple round function using only word rotations and a bit-wise AND operation. Previous work has shown a strong clustering effect for differential and linear cryptanalysis, due to the existence of many trails with the same inputs and outputs. In this paper, we explore this clustering effect by exhibiting a class of high probability differential and linear trails where the active bits stay in a fixed window of w bits. Instead of enumerating a set of good trails contributing to a differential or a linear approximation, we compute the probability distribution over this space, including all trails in the class. This results in stronger distinguishers than previously proposed, and we describe key recovery attacks against Simon and Simeck improving the previous results by up to 7 rounds. In particular, we obtain an attack against 42-round Simeck64, leaving only two rounds of security margin, and an attack against 45-round Simon96/144, reducing the security margin from 16 rounds to 9 rounds.
papers.abstract_zh: Simon和Simeck是两种轻量级分组密码，具有简单的循环函数，仅使用字旋转和逐位and运算。由于存在许多具有相同输入和输出的踪迹，先前的工作已经显示了差分和线性密码分析的强聚类效应。在本文中，我们通过展示一类高概率差分和线性轨迹来探索这种聚类效应，其中活动位停留在w位的固定窗口中。我们计算这个空间上的概率分布，包括这个类中的所有踪迹，而不是枚举一组有助于微分或线性近似的好踪迹。这导致了比以前提出的更强的区分符，并且我们描述了针对Simon和Simeck的密钥恢复攻击，将以前的结果提高了多达7轮。特别地，我们获得对42轮Simeck64的攻击，仅留下两轮安全余量，以及对45轮Simon96/144的攻击，将安全余量从16轮减少到9轮。
papers.title_zh: 西蒙和西梅克的聚集效应

papers.title: Convexity of Division Property Transitions: Theory, Algorithms and Compact Models
papers.authors: Aleksei Udovenko
papers.abstract: Integral cryptanalysis is a powerful tool for attacking symmetric primitives, and division property is a state-of-the-art framework for finding integral distinguishers. This work describes new theoretical and practical insights into traditional bit-based division property. We focus on analyzing and exploiting monotonicity/convexity of division property and its relation to the graph indicator. In particular, our investigation leads to a new compact representation of propagation, which allows CNF/MILP modeling for larger S-Boxes, such as 16-bit Super-Sboxes of lightweight block ciphers or even 32-bit random S-boxes. This solves the challenge posed by Derbez and Fouque (ToSC 2020), who questioned the possibility of SAT/SMT/MILP modeling of 16-bit Super-Sboxes. As a proof-of-concept, we model the Super-Sboxes of the 8-round LED by CNF formulas, which was not feasible by any previous approach. Our analysis is further supported by an elegant algorithmic framework. We describe simple algorithms for computing division property of a set of n-bit vectors in time O(n2), reducing such sets to minimal/maximal elements in time O(n2), computing division property propagation table of an n × m-bit S-box and its compact representation in time O((n + m)2n+m). In addition, we develop an advanced algorithm tailored to “heavy” bijections, allowing to model, for example, a randomly generated 32-bit S-box.
papers.abstract_zh: 整数密码分析是攻击对称原语的有力工具，而除法性质是寻找整数区分符的最新框架。这项工作描述了对传统的基于比特的除法性质的新的理论和实践见解。我们着重于分析和利用除法性质的单调性/凸性及其与图指标的关系。特别是，我们的研究导致了一种新的传播的紧凑表示，它允许对更大的S盒进行CNF/MILP建模，例如轻量级分组密码的16位超级盒，甚至32位随机S盒。这解决了Derbez和Fouque (ToSC 2020)提出的挑战，他们质疑16位超级机顶盒的SAT/SMT/MILP建模的可能性。作为概念验证，我们用CNF公式建立了8回合超级盒子模型，这在以前的方法中是不可行的。一个优雅的算法框架进一步支持了我们的分析。我们描述了在时间O(n2)中计算一组n位向量的除法性质、在时间O(n2)中将这些集合简化为最小/最大元素、在时间O((n + m)2n+m)中计算n × m位S盒的除法性质传播表及其紧致表示的简单算法。此外，我们开发了一种高级算法，专门针对“重”双射，允许建模，例如，随机生成的32位S盒。
papers.title_zh: 除法性质转换的凸性:理论、算法和紧致模型

papers.title: Quantum Linearization Attacks
papers.authors: Xavier Bonnetain, Gaëtan Leurent, María Naya-Plasencia, André Schrottenloher
papers.abstract: Recent works have shown that quantum period-finding can be used to break many popular constructions (some block ciphers such as Even-Mansour, multiple MACs and AEs. . . ) in the superposition query model. So far, all the constructions broken exhibited a strong algebraic structure, which enables to craft a periodic function of a single input block. Recovering the secret period allows to recover a key, distinguish, break the confidentiality or authenticity of these modes. In this paper, we introduce the quantum linearization attack, a new way of using Simon’s algorithm to target MACs in the superposition query model. Specifically, we use inputs of multiple blocks as an interface to a function hiding a linear structure. Recovering this structure allows to perform forgeries. We also present some variants of this attack that use other quantum algorithms, which are much less common in quantum symmetric cryptanalysis: Deutsch’s, Bernstein-Vazirani’s, and Shor’s. To the best of our knowledge, this is the first time these algorithms have been used in quantum forgery or key-recovery attacks. Our attack breaks many parallelizable MACs such as LightMac, PMAC, and numerous variants with (classical) beyond-birthday-bound security (LightMAC+, PMAC+) or using tweakable block ciphers (ZMAC). More generally, it shows that constructing parallelizable quantum-secure PRFs might be a challenging task.
papers.abstract_zh: 最近的工作表明，量子周期发现可以用来破解许多流行的结构(一些分组密码，如偶数曼苏尔，多MAC和AEs。。。)在叠加查询模型中。到目前为止，所有被破坏的结构都表现出很强的代数结构，这使得我们能够制作一个单输入块的周期函数。恢复秘密期允许恢复密钥、区分、破解这些模式的机密性或真实性。本文介绍了量子线性化攻击，这是一种在叠加查询模型中使用Simon算法攻击MAC的新方法。具体来说，我们使用多个块的输入作为隐藏线性结构的函数的接口。恢复这种结构允许进行伪造。我们还介绍了这种攻击的一些变体，它们使用了在量子对称密码分析中不太常见的其他量子算法:Deutsch算法、Bernstein-Vazirani算法和Shor算法。据我们所知，这是这些算法首次被用于量子伪造或密钥恢复攻击。我们的攻击破坏了许多可并行化的Mac，如LightMac、PMAC和许多具有(经典)超越生日限制安全性(LightMAC+、PMAC+)或使用可调分组密码(ZMAC)的变体。更一般地，它表明构造可并行的量子安全PRFs可能是一项具有挑战性的任务。
papers.title_zh: 量子线性化攻击

papers.title: Quantum Computationally Predicate-Binding Commitments with Application in Quantum Zero-Knowledge Arguments for NP
papers.authors: Jun Yan
papers.abstract: A quantum bit commitment scheme is to realize bit (rather than qubit) commitment by exploiting quantum communication and quantum computation. In this work, we study the binding property of the quantum string commitment scheme obtained by composing a generic quantum computationally-binding bit commitment scheme in parallel. We show that the resulting scheme satisfies a stronger quantum computational binding property than the trivial honest-binding, which we call predicate-binding. Intuitively and very roughly, the predicate-binding property guarantees that given any inconsistent predicate pair over a set of strings (i.e. no strings in this set can satisfy both predicates), if a (claimed) quantum commitment can be opened so that the revealed string satisfies one predicate with certainty, then the same commitment cannot be opened so that the revealed string satisfies the other predicate except for a negligible probability. As an application, we plug a generic quantum perfectly(resp. statistically)-hiding computationallybinding bit commitment scheme in Blum’s zero-knowledge protocol for the NP-complete language Hamiltonian Cycle. The quantum computational soundness of the resulting protocol will follow immediately from the quantum computational predicate-binding property of commitments. Combined with the perfect(resp. statistical) zero-knowledge property which can be similarly established as Watrous [Wat09], as well as known constructions of quantum computationallybinding bit commitment scheme, this gives rise to the first quantum perfect(resp. statistical) zero-knowledge argument system for all NP languages merely relying on quantum-secure oneway functions. ∗Email: tjunyan@jnu.edu.cn
papers.abstract_zh: 量子比特承诺方案是利用量子通信和量子计算实现比特(而不是量子比特)承诺。在本文中，我们研究了通过并行构造一个通用的量子计算绑定比特承诺方案得到的量子串承诺方案的绑定性质。我们证明了所得到的方案比平凡的诚实绑定(我们称之为谓词绑定)满足更强的量子计算绑定性质。直观地和非常粗略地，谓词绑定属性保证给定一组字符串上的任何不一致的谓词对(即，该组中没有字符串可以满足两个谓词)，如果(所声明的)量子承诺可以被打开，使得所揭示的字符串确实满足一个谓词，则相同的承诺不能被打开，使得所揭示的字符串满足另一个谓词，除非概率可以忽略不计。作为一个应用程序，我们完美地插入了一个通用的量子。在Blum的零知识协议中为NP-完全语言哈密尔顿循环隐藏计算绑定比特承诺方案。由此产生的协议的量子计算可靠性将直接来自承诺的量子计算谓词绑定特性。结合完美(resp。统计的)零知识性质，这可以类似地建立为Watrous [Wat09]，以及量子计算绑定比特承诺方案的已知构造，这产生了第一个量子完美(分别为。统计)零知识论证系统，用于所有NP语言，仅依赖于量子安全单向函数。*电子邮件:tjunyan@jnu.edu.cn
papers.title_zh: 量子计算谓词绑定承诺及其在NP量子零知识论证中的应用

papers.title: Proofs for Inner Pairing Products and Applications
papers.authors: Benedikt Bünz, Mary Maller, Pratyush Mishra, Nirvan Tyagi, Psi Vesely
papers.abstract: We present a generalized inner product argument and demonstrate its applications to pairing-based languages. We apply our generalized argument to proving that an inner pairing product is correctly evaluated with respect to committed vectors of n source group elements. With a structured reference string (SRS), we achieve a logarithmic-time verifier whose work is dominated by 6 log n target group exponentiations. Proofs are of size 6 log n target group elements, computed using 6n pairings and 4n exponentiations in each source group. We apply our inner product arguments to build the first polynomial commitment scheme with succinct (logarithmic) verification, O( √ d) prover complexity for degree d polynomials (not including the cost to evaluate the polynomial), and a CRS of size O( √ d). Concretely, this means that for d = 2, producing an evaluation proof in our protocol is 76× faster than doing so in the KZG [KZG10] commitment scheme, and the CRS in our protocol is 1, 000× smaller: 13MB vs 13GB for KZG. This gap only grows as the degree increases. Our polynomial commitment scheme is applicable to both univariate and bivariate polynomials. As a second application, we introduce an argument for aggregating n Groth16 zkSNARKs into an O(log n) sized proof. Our protocol is significantly more efficient than aggregating these SNARKs via recursive composition [BCGMMW20]: we can aggregate about 130, 000 proofs in 25min, while in the same time recursive composition aggregates just 90 proofs. Finally, we show how to apply our aggregation protocol to construct a low-memory SNARK for machine computations. For a computation that requires time T and space S, our SNARK produces proofs in space Õ(S + T ), which is significantly more space efficient than a monolithic SNARK, which requires space Õ(S · T ).
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一个广义内积论证，并展示了它在基于配对的语言中的应用。我们应用我们的广义论证来证明一个内部配对乘积关于n个源组元素的承诺向量被正确地评估。利用结构化参考串(SRS ),我们实现了一个对数时间验证器，它的工作由6个log n目标群幂运算支配。证明的大小为6 log n个目标组元素，在每个源组中使用6n个配对和4n个幂运算来计算。我们应用我们的内积论证来构建第一个多项式承诺方案，其具有简洁的(对数)验证，d次多项式的O( √ d)证明者复杂性(不包括评估多项式的成本)，以及大小为O( √ d)的CRS。具体地，这意味着对于d = 2，在我们的协议中产生评估证明比在KZG [KZG10]承诺方案中快76倍，并且我们的协议中的CRS小1000倍:13MB对KZG的13GB。这种差距只会随着学位的增加而扩大。我们的多项式承诺方案适用于一元和二元多项式。作为第二个应用，我们引入一个将n个Groth16 zkSNARKs聚合成一个O(log n)大小的证明的参数。我们的协议明显比通过递归合成来聚合这些SNARKs更有效[BCG mw20]:我们可以在25分钟内聚合大约130，000个证明，而在同一时间递归合成仅聚合90个证明。最后，我们展示了如何应用我们的聚合协议为机器计算构建一个低内存的SNARK。对于需要时间T和空间S的计算，我们的SNARK在空间\u( S+T)中产生证明，这明显比需要空间\u( S T)的单片SNARK更节省空间。
papers.title_zh: 内部配对乘积的证明及其应用

papers.title: Snarky Ceremonies
papers.authors: Markulf Kohlweiss, Mary Maller, Janno Siim, Mikhail Volkhov
papers.abstract: . Succinct non-interactive arguments of knowledge (SNARKs) have found nu-merous applications in the blockchain setting and elsewhere. The most eﬃcient SNARKs require a distributed ceremony protocol to generate public parameters, also known as a structured reference string (SRS). Our contributions are two-fold: We We show that the original construction optimized, and then prove its in our new framework. Importantly, our construction the random in the original

papers.title: Bit Security as Computational Cost for Winning Games with High Probability
papers.authors: Shun Watanabe, Kenji Yasunaga
papers.abstract: We introduce a novel framework for quantifying the bit security of security games. Our notion is defined with an operational meaning that a λ-bit secure game requires a total computational cost of 2 for winning the game with high probability, e.g., 0.99. We define the bit security both for search-type and decision-type games. Since we identify that these two types of games should be structurally different, we treat them differently but define the bit security using the unified framework to guarantee the same operational interpretation. The key novelty of our notion of bit security is to employ two types of adversaries: inner adversary and outer adversary. While the inner adversary plays a “usual” security game, the outer adversary invokes the inner adversary many times to amplify the winning probability for the security game. We find from our framework that the bit security for decision games can be characterized by the information measure called the Rényi divergence of order 1/2 of the inner adversary. The conventional “advantage,” defined as the probability of winning the game, characterizes our bit security for searchtype games. We present several security reductions in our framework for justifying our notion of bit security. Many of our results quantitatively match the results for the bit security notion proposed by Micciancio and Walter in 2018. In this sense, our bit security strengthens the previous notion of bit security by adding an operational meaning. A difference from their work is that, in our framework, the Goldreich-Levin theorem gives an optimal reduction only for “balanced” adversaries who output binary values in a balanced manner.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们引入了一个新的框架来量化安全游戏的比特安全性。我们的概念被定义为具有操作意义，即λ位安全游戏要求总计算成本为2，以高概率赢得游戏，例如0.99。我们定义了搜索型和决策型博弈的比特安全性。因为我们认为这两种类型的游戏在结构上应该是不同的，所以我们对它们进行了不同的处理，但是使用统一的框架来定义bit安全性，以保证相同的操作解释。我们的比特安全概念的关键新颖之处在于使用了两种类型的对手:内部对手和外部对手。当内部对手玩“通常的”安全游戏时，外部对手多次调用内部对手来放大安全游戏的获胜概率。我们从我们的框架中发现，决策博弈的比特安全性可以用称为内部对手1/2阶雷尼散度的信息度量来表征。传统的“优势”，定义为赢得游戏的概率，表征了我们的搜索类型游戏的位安全性。我们在我们的框架中提出了几个安全缩减来证明我们的位安全概念。我们的许多结果在数量上与Micciancio和Walter在2018年提出的位安全概念的结果相匹配。从这个意义上说，我们的位安全通过增加一个操作性的含义，加强了以前的位安全概念。与他们的工作不同的是，在我们的框架中，Goldreich-Levin定理只对以平衡方式输出二进制值的“平衡”对手给出了最优约简。
papers.title_zh: 比特安全作为高概率获胜游戏的计算代价

papers.title: FAST: Secure and High Performance Format-Preserving Encryption and Tokenization
papers.authors: F. Betül Durak, Henning Horst, Michael Horst, Serge Vaudenay
papers.abstract: We propose a new construction for format-preserving encryption. Our design provides the flexibility for use in format-preserving encryption (FPE) and for static table-driven tokenization. Our algorithm is a substitution-permutation network based on random Sboxes. Using pseudorandom generators and pseudorandom functions, we prove a strong adaptive security based on the super-pseudorandom permutation assumption of our core design. We obtain empirical parameters to reach this assumption. We suggest parameters for quantum security. Our design accommodates very small domains, with a radix a from 4 to the Unicode alphabet size and a block length l starting 2. The number of Sbox evaluations per encryption is asymptotically l 3 2 , which is also the number of bytes we need to generate using AES in CTR mode for each tweak setup. For instance, we tokenize 10 decimal digits using 29 (parallel) AES computations to be done only once, when the tweak changes.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们提出了一种新的保格式加密结构。我们的设计为格式保留加密(FPE)和静态表驱动的令牌化提供了灵活性。我们的算法是一个基于随机盒的置换网络。使用伪随机发生器和伪随机函数，我们证明了基于我们的核心设计的超伪随机置换假设的强自适应安全性。我们获得经验参数来达到这个假设。我们建议量子安全的参数。我们的设计适应非常小的域，基数a从4到Unicode字母大小，块长度l从2开始。每次加密的Sbox求值次数接近l ^ 3 ^ 2，这也是我们在CTR模式下使用AES为每次调整设置生成的字节数。例如，当调整发生变化时，我们使用29(并行)AES计算对10个十进制数字进行令牌化，只需进行一次。

papers.title: Gladius: LWR Based Efficient Hybrid Public Key Encryption with Distributed Decryption
papers.authors: Kelong Cong, Daniele Cozzo, Varun Maram, Nigel P. Smart
papers.abstract: Standard hybrid encryption schemes based on the KEM-DEM framework are hard to implement efficiently in a distributed manner whilst maintaining the CCA security property of the scheme. This is because the DEM needs to be decrypted under the key encapsulated by the KEM, before the whole ciphertext is declared valid. In this paper we present a new variant of the KEM-DEM framework, closely related to Tag-KEMs, which sidesteps this issue. We then present a post-quantum KEM for this framework based on Learning-with-Rounding, which is designed specifically to have fast distributed decryption. Our combined construction of a hybrid encryption scheme with Learning-with-Rounding based KEM, called Gladius, is closely related to the NIST Round 3 candidate called Saber. Finally, we give a prototype distributed implementation that achieves a decapsulation time of 4.99 seconds for three parties.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于KEM-DEM框架的标准混合加密方案难以在保持方案的CCA安全属性的同时以分布式方式有效实现。这是因为在宣布整个密文有效之前，DEM需要在KEM封装的密钥下解密。在本文中，我们提出了一个新的变种的KEM-DEM框架，密切相关的标签-KEMs，回避了这个问题。然后，我们为这个框架提出了一个基于舍入学习的后量子KEM，它是专门为快速分布式解密而设计的。我们的混合加密方案与基于舍入学习的KEM(称为Gladius)的组合构造与NIST第三轮候选方案(称为Saber)密切相关。最后，我们给出了一个原型分布式实现，实现了4.99秒的三方解封装时间。

papers.title: A New Variant of Unbalanced Oil and Vinegar Using Quotient Ring: QR-UOV
papers.authors: Hiroki Furue, Yasuhiko Ikematsu, Yutaro Kiyomura, Tsuyoshi Takagi
papers.abstract: The unbalanced oil and vinegar signature scheme (UOV) is a multivariate signature scheme that has essentially not been broken for over 20 years. However, it requires the use of a large public key, so various methods have been proposed to reduce its size. In this paper, we propose a new variant of UOV with the public key represented by block matrices whose components are represented as an element of a quotient ring. We discuss how the irreducibility of the polynomial used to generate the quotient ring affects the security of our proposed scheme. Furthermore, we propose parameters for our proposed scheme and discuss their security against currently known and possible attacks. We show that our proposed scheme can reduce the public key size without significantly increasing the signature size compared with other UOV variants. For example, the public key size of our proposed scheme is 66.7 KB for NIST’s PostQuantum Cryptography Project (security level 3), while that of cyclic Rainbow is 252.3 KB, where Rainbow is a variant of UOV and one of the third round finalists of NIST PQC project.
papers.abstract_zh: 不平衡的油和醋签名方案(UOV)是一个多元签名方案，基本上20多年来没有被打破。然而，它需要使用大的公钥，因此已经提出了各种方法来减小它的大小。在本文中，我们提出了一种新的UOV变体，其公钥由分块矩阵表示，分块矩阵的分量表示为商环的一个元素。我们讨论了用于生成商环的多项式的不可约性如何影响我们提出的方案的安全性。此外，我们提出了参数为我们提出的方案，并讨论了他们的安全性对目前已知的和可能的攻击。我们证明，与其他UOV变体相比，我们提出的方案可以在不显著增加签名大小的情况下减少公钥大小。例如，我们提出的方案的公钥长度为66.7 KB，用于NIST的后量子密码术项目(安全级别3)，而循环彩虹的公钥长度为252.3 KB，其中彩虹是UOV的变体，并且是NIST PQC项目的第三轮决赛者之一。
papers.title_zh: 利用商环的非平衡油醋新变体:QR-UOV

papers.title: Bounded Collusion ABE for TMs from IBE
papers.authors: Rishab Goyal, Ridwan Syed, Brent Waters
papers.abstract: We give an attribute-based encryption system for Turing Machines that is provably secure assuming only the existence of identity-based encryption (IBE) for large identity spaces. Currently, IBE is known to be realizable from most mainstream number theoretic assumptions that imply public key cryptography including factoring, the search Diffie-Hellman assumption, and the Learning with Errors assumption. Our core construction provides security against an attacker that makes a single key query for a machine T before declaring a challenge string w∗ that is associated with the challenge ciphertext. We build our construction by leveraging a Garbled RAM construction of Gentry, Halevi, Raykova and Wichs [GHRW14a]; however, to prove security we need to introduce a new notion of security called iterated simulation security. We then show how to transform our core construction into one that is secure for an a-priori bounded number q = q(λ) of key queries that can occur either before or after the challenge ciphertext. We do this by first showing how one can use a special type of non-committing encryption to transform a system that is secure only if a single key is chosen before the challenge ciphertext is declared into one where the single key can be requested either before or after the challenge ciphertext. We give a simple construction of this non-committing encryption from public key encryption in the Random Oracle Model. Next, one can apply standard combinatorial techniques to lift from single-key adaptive security to q-key adaptive security.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们给出了一个图灵机的基于属性的加密系统，它是可证明安全的，只假设在大的身份空间中存在基于身份的加密(IBE)。目前，已知IBE可以从大多数主流数论假设中实现，这些假设包含公钥密码学，包括因式分解、搜索Diffie-Hellman假设和带错误学习假设。我们的核心构造提供了针对攻击者的安全性，该攻击者在声明与挑战密文相关联的挑战字符串w *之前对机器T进行单个密钥查询。我们通过利用Gentry、Halevi、Raykova和Wichs [GHRW14a]的乱码RAM结构来构建我们的结构；然而，为了证明安全性，我们需要引入一个新的安全性概念，称为迭代模拟安全性。然后，我们展示了如何将我们的核心构造转换成一个对于先验有界数量q = q(λ)的密钥查询是安全的构造，这些密钥查询可以出现在挑战密文之前或之后。我们首先展示如何使用一种特殊类型的非提交加密来将一个只有在质询密文被声明之前选择了单个密钥才是安全的系统转换成一个在质询密文之前或之后都可以请求单个密钥的系统。我们从随机预言模型中的公钥加密给出了这种非承诺加密的一个简单构造。接下来，可以应用标准的组合技术从单密钥自适应安全提升到q密钥自适应安全。

papers.title: The One-More Discrete Logarithm Assumption in the Generic Group Model
papers.authors: Balthazar Bauer, Georg Fuchsbauer, Antoine Plouviez
papers.abstract: . The one more-discrete logarithm assumption (OMDL) underlies the security analysis of identiﬁcation protocols, blind signature and multi-signature schemes, such as blind Schnorr signatures and the recent MuSig2 multi-signatures. As these schemes produce standard Schnorr signatures, they are compatible with existing systems, e.g. in the context of blockchains. OMDL is moreover assumed for many results on the impossibility of certain security reductions. Despite its wide use, surprisingly, OMDL is lacking any rigorous analysis; there is not even a proof that it holds in the generic group model (GGM). (We show that a claimed proof is ﬂawed.) In this work we give a formal proof of OMDL in the GGM. We also prove a related assumption, the one-more computational Diﬃe-Hellman assumption, in the GGM. Our proofs deviate from prior GGM proofs and replace the use of the Schwartz-Zippel Lemma by a new argument.
papers.abstract_zh: 。多一个离散对数假设(OMDL)是身份识别协议、盲签名和多重签名方案(如盲Schnorr签名和最近的MuSig2多重签名)的安全性分析的基础。因为这些方案产生标准的Schnorr签名，所以它们与现有系统兼容，例如在区块链的环境中。此外，许多结果都假定OMDL不可能采取某些安全措施。尽管它被广泛使用，令人惊讶的是，OMDL缺乏任何严格的分析；甚至没有证据证明它在一般群体模型(GGM)中成立。(我们证明一个声称的证据是可信的。)在这篇文章中，我们给出了GGM中OMDL的一个正式证明。我们还在GGM中证明了一个相关的假设，多计算Diﬃe-Hellman假设。我们的证明偏离了先前的GGM证明，并用一个新的论证取代了Schwartz-Zippel引理的使用。
papers.title_zh: 一般群体模型中的一元离散对数假设

papers.title: Symmetric Key Exchange with Full Forward Security and Robust Synchronization
papers.authors: Colin Boyd, Gareth T. Davies, Bor de Kock, Kai Gellert, Tibor Jager, Lise Millerjord
papers.abstract: We construct lightweight authenticated key exchange protocols based on pre-shared keys, which achieve full forward security and rely only on simple and efficient symmetric-key primitives. All of our protocols have rigorous security proofs in a strong security model, all have low communication complexity, and are particularly suitable for resource-constrained devices. We describe three protocols that apply linear key evolution to provide different performance and security properties. Correctness in parallel and concurrent protocol sessions is difficult to achieve for linearly key-evolving protocols, emphasizing the need for assurance of availability alongside the usual confidentiality and authentication security goals. We introduce synchronization robustness as a new formal security goal, which essentially guarantees that parties can re-synchronize efficiently. All of our new protocols achieve this property. Since protocols based on linear key evolution cannot guarantee that all concurrently initiated sessions successfully derive a key, we also propose two constructions with non-linear key evolution based on puncturable PRFs. These are instantiable from standard hash functions and requireO(C ·log(|CTR|)) memory, where C is the number of concurrent sessions and |CTR| is an upper bound on the total number of sessions per party. These are the first protocols to simultaneously achieve full forward security, synchronization robustness, and concurrent correctness. This work was supported by Deutscher Akademischer Austauschdienst (DAAD) and Norges forskningsråd (NFR) under the PPP-Norwegen programme. Colin Boyd and Lise Millerjord have been supported by NFR project number 288545. Tibor Jager and Gareth T. Davies have been supported by the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union’s Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme, grant agreement 802823.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们构造了基于预共享密钥的轻量级认证密钥交换协议，该协议实现了完全的前向安全性，并且只依赖简单有效的对称密钥原语。我们所有的协议都在强安全模型下具有严格的安全性证明，都具有较低的通信复杂度，并且特别适用于资源受限的设备。我们描述了三种应用线性密钥进化来提供不同性能和安全属性的协议。对于线性密钥进化协议来说，并行和并发协议会话中的正确性很难实现，这强调了除了通常的机密性和认证安全目标之外，还需要保证可用性。我们引入同步健壮性作为一个新的正式安全目标，它本质上保证了各方可以有效地重新同步。我们所有的新协议都实现了这一特性。由于基于线性密钥进化的协议不能保证所有并发发起的会话都成功地获得密钥，我们还提出了两个基于可穿孔PRFs的非线性密钥进化的构造。这些可以从标准哈希函数和requireO(C log(|CTR|))内存中实例化，其中C是并发会话的数量，而|CTR|是每一方的会话总数的上限。这些是第一批同时实现完全前向安全性、同步健壮性和并发正确性的协议。这项工作得到了DAAD的Deutscher Akademischer Austauschdienst和NFR的Norges forskningsrå在PPP-Norwegen方案下的支持。Colin Boyd和Lise Millerjord得到了NFR项目288545的支持。Tibor Jager和Gareth T. Davies在欧盟的Horizon 2020研究和创新计划(赠款协议802823)下得到了欧洲研究理事会(ERC)的支持。

papers.title: Fault-Injection Attacks Against NIST's Post-Quantum Cryptography Round 3 KEM Candidates
papers.authors: Keita Xagawa, Akira Ito, Rei Ueno, Junko Takahashi, Naofumi Homma
papers.abstract: We investigate all NIST PQC Round 3 KEM candidates from the viewpoint of fault-injection attacks: Classic McEliece, Kyber, NTRU, Saber, BIKE, FrodoKEM, HQC, NTRU Prime, and SIKE. All KEM schemes use variants of the Fujisaki-Okamoto transformation, so the equality test with re-encryption in decapsulation is critical. We survey effective key-recovery attacks when we can skip the equality test. We found the existing keyrecovery attacks against Kyber, NTRU, Saber, FrodoKEM, HQC, one of two KEM schemes in NTRU Prime, and SIKE. We propose a new key-recovery attack against the other KEM scheme in NTRU Prime. We also report an attack against BIKE that leads to leakage of information of secret keys. The open-source pqm4 library contains all KEM schemes except Classic McEliece and HQC. We show that giving a single instruction-skipping fault in the decapsulation processes leads to skipping the equality test virtually for Kyber, NTRU, Saber, BIKE, and SIKE. We also report the experimental attacks against them. We also report the implementation of NTRU Prime allows chosen-ciphertext attacks freely and the timing sidechannel of FrodoKEM reported in Guo, Johansson, and Nilsson (CRYPTO 2020) remains, while there are no such bugs in their NIST PQC Round 3 submissions. keywords: post-quantum cryptography, NIST PQC standardization, KEM, the Fujisaki-Okamoto transformation, fault-injection attacks.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们从故障注入攻击的角度调查了所有NIST PQC第三轮KEM候选人:经典麦克埃利斯，凯伯，NTRU，军刀，自行车，蛙人，HQC，NTRU总理，和赛克。所有的KEM方案都使用藤崎琴音-冈本变换的变体，因此在解封装中使用重新加密的等式测试是至关重要的。当我们可以跳过等式测试时，我们调查有效的密钥恢复攻击。我们发现现有的密钥恢复攻击针对凯伯，NTRU，军刀，弗罗多肯，HQC，NTRU总理的两个KEM方案之一，和西克。针对NTRU素数中的另一个KEM方案，我们提出了一种新的密钥恢复攻击。我们还报告了一个针对BIKE的攻击，它导致了密钥信息的泄露。开源的pqm4库包含了除经典的麦克埃利斯和HQC之外的所有KEM方案。我们证明了在解封装过程中给出一个指令跳过错误会导致对凯伯、NTRU、赛博、比克和赛克跳过相等测试。我们还报告了针对它们的实验性攻击。我们还发现素数的实现允许自由选择密文攻击，郭、Johansson和Nilsson (CRYPTO 2020)提出的FrodoKEM定时旁路仍然存在，而他们在PQC第三轮提交的论文中没有这样的错误。关键词:后量子密码，NIST PQC标准化，KEM，藤崎琴音-冈本变换，故障注入攻击。

papers.title: Dynamic Random Probing Expansion with Quasi Linear Asymptotic Complexity
papers.authors: Sonia Belaïd, Matthieu Rivain, Abdul Rahman Taleb, Damien Vergnaud
papers.abstract: The masking countermeasure is widely used to protect cryptographic implementations against side-channel attacks. While many masking schemes are shown to be secure in the widely deployed probing model, the latter raised a number of concerns regarding its relevance in practice. O↵ering the adversary the knowledge of a fixed number of intermediate variables, it does not capture the so-called horizontal attacks which exploit the repeated manipulation of sensitive variables. Therefore, recent works have focused on the random probing model in which each computed variable leaks with some given probability p. This model benefits from fitting better the reality of the embedded devices. In particular, Beläıd, Coron, Prou↵, Rivain, and Taleb (CRYPTO 2020) introduced a framework to generate random probing circuits. Their compiler somehow extends base gadgets as soon as they satisfy a notion called random probing expandability (RPE). A subsequent work from Beläıd, Rivain, and Taleb (EUROCRYPT 2021) went a step forward with tighter properties and improved complexities. In particular, their construction reaches a complexity of O(), for a -bit security, while tolerating a leakage probability of p = 2 . In this paper, we generalize the random probing expansion approach by considering a dynamic choice of the base gadgets at each step in the expansion. This approach makes it possible to use gadgets with high number of shares –which enjoy better asymptotic complexity in the expansion framework– while still tolerating the best leakage rate usually obtained for small gadgets. We investigate strategies for the choice of the sequence of compilers and show that it can reduce the complexity of an AES implementation by a factor 10. We also significantly improve the asymptotic complexity of the expanding compiler by exhibiting new asymptotic gadget constructions. Specifically, we introduce RPE gadgets for linear operations featuring a quasi-linear complexity as well as an RPE multiplication gadget with linear number of multiplications. These new gadgets drop the complexity of the expanding compiler from quadratic to quasi-linear.
papers.abstract_zh: 屏蔽对策广泛用于保护密码实现免受旁路攻击。虽然许多屏蔽方案在广泛部署的探测模型中被证明是安全的，但是后者引起了关于其在实践中的相关性的许多关注。O↵ering的对手知道固定数量的中间变量，但它没有捕捉到所谓的水平攻击，这种攻击利用了对敏感变量的重复操纵。因此，最近的工作集中于随机探测模型，其中每个计算的变量以某个给定的概率p泄漏。该模型受益于更好地拟合嵌入式设备的现实。特别是，贝尔德、科伦、Prou↵、里瓦因和塔勒布(CRYPTO 2020)引入了一个生成随机探测电路的框架。他们的编译器以某种方式扩展了基本小工具，只要它们满足一个叫做随机探测可扩展性(RPE)的概念。Bel ed、Rivain和Taleb的后续工作(EUROCRYPT 2021)向前迈进了一步，具有更紧密的特性和改进的复杂性。特别地，对于-bit安全性，它们的构造达到了O(的复杂度，同时容忍p = 2的泄漏概率。在本文中，我们通过考虑在扩展的每一步中动态选择基本小工具来推广随机探测扩展方法。这种方法使得使用具有高份额数的小工具成为可能——在扩展框架中享有更好的渐近复杂性——同时仍然容忍小工具通常获得的最佳泄漏率。我们研究了选择编译器序列的策略，并表明它可以将AES实现的复杂性降低10倍。我们还通过展示新的渐近gadget构造，显著提高了扩展编译器的渐近复杂性。具体来说，我们介绍了用于线性运算的RPE小工具，其特点是具有准线性复杂性，以及具有线性乘法次数的RPE乘法小工具。这些新工具将扩展编译器的复杂性从二次型降低到准线性型。

papers.title: Better Security-Efficiency Trade-Offs in Permutation-Based Two-Party Computation
papers.authors: Yu Long Chen, Stefano Tessaro
papers.abstract: We improve upon the security of (tweakable) correlationrobust hash functions, which are essential components of garbling schemes and oblivious-transfer extension schemes. We in particular focus on constructions from permutations, and improve upon the work by Guo et al. (IEEE S&P ’20) in terms of security and efficiency. We present a tweakable one-call construction which matches the security of the most secure two-call construction – the resulting security bound takes form O((p+q)q/2), where q is the number of construction evaluations and p is the number of direct adversarial queries to the underlying n-bit permutation, which is modeled as random. Moreover, we present a new two-call construction with much better security degradation – in particular, for applications of interest, where only a constant number of evaluations per tweak are made, the security degrades as O(( √ qp + q)/2). Our security proof relies on on the sum-capture theorems (Babai ’02; Steinberger ’12, Cogliati and Seurin ’18), as well as on new balls-into-bins combinatorial lemmas for limited independence ball-throws. Of independent interest, we also provide a self-contained concrete security treatment of oblivious transfer extension.
papers.abstract_zh: 我们改进了(可调整的)相关鲁棒散列函数的安全性，它是乱码方案和不经意传输扩展方案的必要组成部分。我们特别关注置换的构造，并在安全性和效率方面改进了郭等人(IEEE 20)的工作。我们提出了一个可调整的一次调用构造，它与最安全的两次调用构造的安全性相匹配——得到的安全界限采用O((p+q)q/2)的形式，其中q是构造评估的次数，p是对底层n位置换的直接对抗查询的次数，n位置换被建模为随机的。此外，我们提出了一种新的两次调用结构，具有更好的安全性退化——特别是，对于感兴趣的应用程序，每次调整只进行恒定数量的评估，安全性退化为O(√qp+q)/2)。我们的安全性证明依赖于和捕获定理(Babai’02；Steinberger '12，Cogliati和Seurin '18)，以及关于有限独立性投球的新的球入箱组合引理。对于独立的兴趣，我们还提供了一个独立的不经意传输扩展的具体安全处理。

papers.title: Astrolabous: A Universally Composable Time-Lock Encryption Scheme
papers.authors: Myrto Arapinis, Nikolaos Lamprou, Thomas Zacharias
papers.abstract: . In this work, we study the cryptographic primitive called time-lock encryption (TLE). The concept of TLE involves a party initiating the encryption of a message that one can only decrypt after a certain amount of time has elapsed. Following the universal composability (UC) paradigm introduced by Canetti [IEEE FOCS 2001], we formally abstract the concept of TLE into an ideal functionality in a ﬂexible way. In addition, we provide a standalone deﬁnition for secure TLE schemes in a game-based style and we devise a hybrid protocol that relies on such a secure TLE scheme. We show that if the underlying TLE scheme satisﬁes the standalone game-based security deﬁnition, then our hybrid protocol UC realises the TLE functionality in the random oracle model. Finally, we present Astrolabous , a TLE construction that satisﬁes our security deﬁnition, leading to the ﬁrst UC realization of the TLE functionality. Interestingly, it is hard to prove UC secure any of the TLE construction proposed in the literature. The reason behind this diﬃculty relates to the UC framework itself. Intuitively, to capture semantic security, no information should be leaked regarding the plaintext in the ideal world, thus the ciphertext should not contain any information relating to the message. On the other hand, all ciphertexts will eventually open, resulting in a trivial distinction of the real from the ideal world in the standard model. We overcome this limitation by extending any secure TLE construction adopting the techniques of Nielsen [CRYPTO 2002] in the random oracle model. Speciﬁcally, the description of the extended TLE algorithms includes calls to the random oracle, allowing our simulator to equivocate. This extension can be applied to any TLE algorithm that satisﬁes our standalone game-based security deﬁnition, and in particular to Astrolabous.
papers.abstract_zh: 。在这项工作中，我们研究了称为时间锁加密(TLE)的密码原语。TLE的概念涉及发起消息加密的一方，只有在经过一定时间后才能解密。遵循Canetti [IEEE FOCS 2001]提出的通用可组合性(UC)范式，我们以灵活的方式将TLE的概念正式抽象为理想的功能。此外，我们以基于游戏的方式为安全TLE方案提供了独立的定义，并且我们设计了依赖于这种安全TLE方案的混合协议。我们证明，如果底层TLE方案满足独立的基于游戏的安全定义，那么我们的混合协议UC在随机oracle模型中实现TLE功能。最后，我们展示Astrolabous，这是一种符合我们安全定义的TLE结构，首次实现了TLE功能。有趣的是，文献中提出的任何TLE结构都很难证明UC是安全的。这种diﬃculty背后的原因与UC框架本身有关。直观地说，为了获得语义安全性，在理想世界中，关于明文的任何信息都不应该泄露，因此密文不应该包含任何与消息相关的信息。另一方面，所有的密文最终都会打开，导致标准模型中现实世界和理想世界的细微差别。我们通过在随机预言模型中采用Nielsen [CRYPTO 2002]的技术来扩展任何安全的TLE构造来克服这个限制。具体来说，扩展TLE算法的描述包括对随机预言的调用，允许我们的模拟器模棱两可。这种扩展可以应用于满足我们独立的基于游戏的安全定义的任何TLE算法，特别是Astrolabous。

papers.title: Succinct and Adaptively Secure ABE for ABP from k-Lin
papers.authors: Huijia Lin, Ji Luo
papers.abstract: We present succinct and adaptively secure attribute-based encryption (ABE) schemes for arithmetic branching programs , based on 𝑘 -Lin in pairing groups. Our key-policy ABE scheme has ciphertexts of constant size , independent of the length of the attributes, and our ciphertext-policy ABE scheme has secret keys of constant size . Our schemes improve upon the recent succinct ABE schemes in [Attrapadung and Tomida, Asiacrypt ’20], which only handle Boolean formulae. All other prior succinct ABE schemes either achieve only selective security or rely on 𝑞 -type assumptions. Our schemes are obtained through a general and modular approach that combines a public-key inner-product functional encryption satisfying a new security notion called gradual simulation security and an information-theoretic randomized encoding scheme called arithmetic key garbling scheme.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于配对群中的𝑘-林，我们提出了简洁且自适应安全的算术分支程序的基于属性的加密方案。我们的密钥策略ABE方案具有恒定大小的密文，与属性的长度无关，并且我们的密文策略ABE方案具有恒定大小的秘密密钥。我们的方案改进了最近[Attrapadung和Tomida，Asiacrypt '20]中的简洁的ABE方案，这些方案只处理布尔公式。所有其他先前简洁的ABE方案要么仅实现选择性安全，要么依赖于𝑞类型的假设。我们的方案是通过一种通用的模块化方法得到的，该方法结合了满足一种新的安全概念的公钥内积函数加密和一种称为算术密钥加密方案的信息论随机化编码方案。

papers.title: Collusion Resistant Trace-and-Revoke for Arbitrary Identities from Standard Assumptions
papers.authors: Sam Kim, David J. Wu
papers.abstract: A traitor tracing scheme is a multi-user public-key encryption scheme where each user in the system holds a decryption key that is associated with the user’s identity. Using the public key, a content distributor can encrypt a message to all of the users in the system. At the same time, if a malicious group of users combine their respective decryption keys to build a “pirate decoder,” there is an efficient tracing algorithm that the content distributor can use to identify at least one of the keys used to construct the decoder. A trace-and-revoke scheme is an extension of a standard traitor tracing scheme where there is an additional key-revocation mechanism that the content distributor can use to disable the decryption capabilities of compromised keys. Namely, during encryption, the content distributor can encrypt a message with respect to a list of revoked users such that only non-revoked users can decrypt the resulting ciphertext. Trace-and-revoke schemes are challenging to construct. Existing constructions from standard assumptions can only tolerate bounded collusions (i.e., there is an a priori bound on the number of keys an adversary obtains), have system parameters that scale exponentially in the bit-length of the identities, or satisfy weaker notions of traceability that are vulnerable to certain types of “pirate evolution” attacks. In this work, we provide the first construction of a trace-and-revoke scheme that is fully collusion resistant and capable of supporting arbitrary identities (i.e., the identities can be drawn from an exponential-size space). Our scheme supports public encryption and secret tracing, and can be based on the sub-exponential hardness of the LWE problem (with a super-polynomial modulus-to-noise ratio). The ciphertext size in our construction scales logarithmically in the size of the identity space and linearly in the size of the revocation list. Our scheme leverages techniques from both combinatorial and algebraic constructions for traitor tracing.
papers.abstract_zh: 叛逆者追踪方案是一种多用户公钥加密方案，其中系统中的每个用户持有与用户身份相关联的解密密钥。使用公钥，内容分发者可以加密发送给系统中所有用户的消息。同时，如果一组恶意用户组合他们各自的解密密钥来构建“盗版解码器”，则存在一种有效的跟踪算法，内容分发者可以使用该算法来识别用于构建解码器的至少一个密钥。跟踪和撤销方案是标准叛逆者跟踪方案的扩展，其中存在附加的密钥撤销机制，内容分发者可以使用该机制来禁用被泄露密钥的解密能力。也就是说，在加密期间，内容分发者可以相对于被撤销的用户的列表来加密消息，使得只有未被撤销的用户可以解密得到的密文。追踪和撤销方案很难构建。根据标准假设的现有构造只能容忍有限的共谋(即，对手获得的密钥数量存在先验界限)，具有在身份的位长上成指数比例变化的系统参数，或者满足易受某些类型的“盗版进化”攻击的可追溯性的较弱概念。在这项工作中，我们提供了第一个追踪和撤销方案的构造，它是完全抗共谋的，并且能够支持任意身份(即，身份可以从指数大小的空间中提取)。我们的方案支持公开加密和秘密追踪，并且可以基于LWE问题的次指数硬度(具有超多项式模噪声比)。在我们的构造中，密文的大小与身份空间的大小成对数比例，与撤销列表的大小成线性比例。我们的方案利用了组合和代数构造的技术来追踪叛逆者。
papers.title_zh: 标准假设下任意身份的抗共谋追踪和撤销

papers.title: Cryptographic Group Actions and Applications
papers.authors: Navid Alamati, Luca De Feo, Hart Montgomery, Sikhar Patranabis
papers.abstract: Isogeny-based assumptions have emerged as a viable option for quantum-secure cryptography. Recent works have shown how to build efﬁcient (public-key) primitives from isogeny-based assumptions such as CSIDH and CSI-FiSh. However, in its present form, the landscape of isogenies does not seem very amenable to realizing new cryptographic applications. Isogeny-based assumptions often have unique efﬁciency and security properties, which makes building new cryptographic applications from them a potentially tedious and time-consuming task. In this work, we propose a new framework based on group actions that enables the easy usage of a variety of isogeny-based assumptions. Our framework generalizes the works of Brassard and Yung (Crypto’90) and Couveignes (Eprint’06). We provide new deﬁnitions for group actions endowed with natural hardness assumptions that model isogeny-based constructions amenable to group actions such as CSIDH and CSI-FiSh. We demonstrate the utility of our new framework by leveraging it to construct several primitives that were not previously known from isogeny-based assumptions. These include smooth projective hashing, dual-mode PKE, two-message statistically sender-private OT, and Naor-Reingold style PRF. These primitives are useful building blocks for a wide range of cryptographic applications. We introduce a new assumption over group actions called Linear Hidden Shift (LHS) assumption. We then present some discussions on the security of the LHS assumption and we show that it implies symmetric KDM-secure encryption, which in turn enables many other primitives that were not previously known from isogeny-based assumptions.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于同源的假设已经成为量子安全密码术的可行选择。最近的工作显示了如何从基于同源的假设(如CSIDH和CSI-FiSh)构建有效的(公钥)原语。然而，在目前的形式下，同源的前景似乎不太适合实现新的加密应用。基于同源的假设通常具有独特的效率和安全属性，这使得从这些假设构建新的加密应用程序成为一项潜在的乏味且耗时的任务。在这项工作中，我们提出了一个基于群体行动的新框架，使各种基于同源的假设易于使用。我们的框架概括了Brassard和Yung (Crypto'90)和Couveignes (Eprint'06)的工作。我们为具有自然硬度假设的群体行动提供了新的定义，这些假设模拟了适合群体行动的基于同源的结构，如CSIDH和CSI-FiSh。我们证明了我们的新框架的效用，利用它来构建几个原始的，以前不知道从同源为基础的假设。这些方法包括平滑投影散列法、双模PKE、双消息统计发送者私有OT和Naor-Reingold式PRF。这些原语是各种加密应用程序的有用构件。我们对群体行为引入了一个新的假设，称为线性隐移(LHS)假设。然后，我们对LHS假设的安全性进行了一些讨论，我们表明它意味着对称的KDM安全加密，这反过来又使得许多其他的基于同源假设的原语成为可能。
papers.title_zh: 密码群体行动和应用

papers.title: Failing Gracefully: Decryption Failures and the Fujisaki-Okamoto Transform
papers.authors: Kathrin Hövelmanns, Andreas Hülsing, Christian Majenz
papers.abstract: In known security reductions for the Fujisaki-Okamoto transformation, decryption failures are handled via a reduction solving the rather unnatural task of finding failing plaintexts given the private key, resulting in a Grover search bound. Moreover, they require an implicit rejection mechanism for invalid ciphertexts to achieve a reasonable security bound in the QROM. We present a reduction that has neither of these deficiencies: We introduce two security games related to finding decryption failures, one capturing the computationally hard task of using the public key to find a decryption failure, and one capturing the statistically hard task of searching the random oracle for key-independent failures like, e.g., large randomness. As a result, our security bounds in the QROM are tighter than previous ones with respect to the generic random oracle search attacks: The attacker can only partially compute the search predicate, namely for said key-independent failures. In addition, our entire reduction works for the explicit-reject variant of the transformation and improves significantly over all of its known reductions. Besides being the more natural variant of the transformation, security of the explicit reject mechanism is also relevant for side channel attack resilience of the implicit-rejection variant. Along the way, we prove several technical results characterizing preimage extraction and certain search tasks in the QROM that might be of independent interest.
papers.abstract_zh: 在已知的用于藤崎琴音-冈本变换的安全归约中，解密失败是通过一个归约来处理的，该归约解决了在给定私钥的情况下寻找失败明文的相当不自然的任务，导致Grover搜索界限。此外，它们需要针对无效密文的隐式拒绝机制，以在QROM中实现合理的安全界限。我们提出了一种没有这些缺陷的简化:我们引入了两个与发现解密失败相关的安全游戏，一个捕获使用公钥来发现解密失败的计算上困难的任务，另一个捕获在随机预言中搜索密钥无关失败(例如大随机性)的统计上困难的任务。因此，我们在QROM中的安全边界比以前关于一般随机oracle搜索攻击的安全边界更紧:攻击者只能部分计算搜索谓词，即对于所述密钥无关的失败。此外，我们的整个约简适用于转换的显式拒绝变体，并且比所有已知的约简都有显著的改进。除了作为转换的更自然的变体，显式拒绝机制的安全性也与隐式拒绝变体的旁道攻击弹性相关。在此过程中，我们证明了几个表征原像提取的技术结果，以及QROM中可能独立感兴趣的某些搜索任务。
papers.title_zh: 优雅地失败:解密失败和藤崎琴音-冈本变换

papers.title: Statistical Decoding 2.0: Reducing Decoding to LPN
papers.authors: Kevin Carrier, Thomas Debris-Alazard, Charles Meyer-Hilfiger, Jean-Pierre Tillich
papers.abstract: The security of code-based cryptography relies primarily on the hardness of generic decoding with linear codes. The best generic decoding algorithms are all improvements of an old algorithm due to Prange: they are known under the name of information set decoders (ISD). A while ago, a generic decoding algorithm which does not belong to this family was proposed: statistical decoding. It is a randomized algorithm that requires the computation of a large set of parity-checks of moderate weight, and uses some kind of majority voting on these equations to recover the error. This algorithm was long forgotten because even the best variants of it performed poorly when compared to the simplest ISD algorithm. We revisit this old algorithm by using parity-check equations in a more general way. Here the parity-checks are used to get LPN samples with a secret which is part of the error and the LPN noise is related to the weight of the parity-checks we produce. The corresponding LPN problem is then solved by standard Fourier techniques. By properly choosing the method of producing these low weight equations and the size of the LPN problem, we are able to outperform in this way significantly information set decodings at code rates smaller than $0.3$. It gives for the first time after $60$ years, a better decoding algorithm for a significant range which does not belong to the ISD family.
papers.abstract_zh: 基于代码的密码术的安全性主要依赖于线性代码的一般解码的难度。最好的通用解码算法都是由于Prange对旧算法的改进:它们被称为信息集解码器(ISD)。不久前，提出了一种不属于这个家族的通用解码算法:统计解码。它是一种随机化算法，需要计算一大组中等权重的奇偶校验，并对这些等式使用某种多数表决来恢复错误。这种算法被遗忘了很久，因为与最简单的ISD算法相比，即使是最好的算法也表现不佳。我们通过以更一般的方式使用奇偶校验方程来重温这个旧算法。这里，奇偶校验用于获得带有秘密的LPN样本，该秘密是误差的一部分，并且LPN噪声与我们产生的奇偶校验的权重相关。相应的LPN问题然后通过标准的傅立叶技术来解决。通过适当地选择产生这些低权重方程的方法和LPN问题的大小，我们能够以这种方式在小于0.3美元的码率下显著地胜过信息集解码。在60年后，它第一次给出了一个不属于ISD家族的更好的解码算法。
papers.title_zh: 统计解码2.0:将解码简化为LPN

papers.title: Functional Encryption with Secure Key Leasing
papers.authors: Fuyuki Kitagawa, Ryo Nishimaki
papers.abstract: Secure software leasing is a quantum cryptographic primitive that enables us to lease software to a user by encoding it into a quantum state. Secure software leasing has a mechanism that verifies whether a returned software is valid or not. The security notion guarantees that once a user returns a software in a valid form, the user no longer uses the software. In this work, we introduce the notion of secret-key functional encryption (SKFE) with secure key leasing, where a decryption key can be securely leased in the sense of secure software leasing. We also instantiate it with standard cryptographic assumptions. More specifically, our contribution is as follows. - We define the syntax and security definitions for SKFE with secure key leasing. - We achieve a transformation from standard SKFE into SKFE with secure key leasing without using additional assumptions. Especially, we obtain bounded collusion-resistant SKFE for P/poly with secure key leasing based on post-quantum one-way functions since we can instantiate bounded collusion-resistant SKFE for P/poly with the assumption. Some previous secure software leasing schemes capture only pirate software that runs on an honest evaluation algorithm (on a legitimate platform). However, our secure key leasing notion captures arbitrary attack strategies and does not have such a limitation. We also introduce the notion of single-decryptor FE (SDFE), where each functional decryption key is copy-protected. Since copy-protection is a stronger primitive than secure software leasing, this notion can be seen as a stronger cryptographic primitive than FE with secure key leasing. More specifically: - We define the syntax and security definitions for SDFE. - We achieve collusion-resistant single-decryptor PKFE for P/poly from post-quantum indistinguishability obfuscation and quantum hardness of the learning with errors problem.
papers.abstract_zh: 安全软件租赁是一种量子加密原语，它使我们能够通过将软件编码为量子状态来将软件租赁给用户。安全软件租赁有一种机制来验证返还的软件是否有效。安全概念保证一旦用户以有效形式返回软件，用户就不再使用该软件。在这篇文章中，我们引入了密钥函数加密(SKFE)和安全密钥租赁的概念，在安全软件租赁的意义下，可以安全地租赁解密密钥。我们还用标准的密码假设来实例化它。更具体地说，我们的贡献如下。-我们通过安全密钥租赁为SKFE定义了语法和安全性定义。-我们实现了从标准SKFE到具有安全密钥租赁的SKFE的转换，而不使用额外的假设。特别地，我们得到了基于后量子单向函数的安全密钥租赁的P/poly的有界抗共谋SKFE，因为我们可以在假设下实例化P/poly的有界抗共谋SKFE。一些先前的安全软件租赁方案仅捕获运行在诚实评估算法(在合法平台上)上的盗版软件。然而，我们的安全密钥租用概念捕获任意攻击策略，并且没有这样的限制。我们还引入了单解密器FE (SDFE)的概念，其中每个功能解密密钥都是复制保护的。因为复制保护是比安全软件租赁更强的原语，所以这个概念可以被视为比具有安全密钥租赁的FE更强的密码原语。更具体地说:-我们为SDFE定义语法和安全性定义。-我们利用后量子不可分辨混淆和带错误学习问题的量子困难性实现了P/poly的抗共谋单解密者PKFE。
papers.title_zh: 具有安全密钥租赁的功能加密

papers.title: Quantum Attacks Without Superposition Queries: The Offline Simon's Algorithm
papers.authors: Xavier Bonnetain, Akinori Hosoyamada, María Naya-Plasencia, Yu Sasaki, André Schrottenloher
papers.abstract: . In symmetric cryptanalysis, the model of superposition queries has led to surprising results, with many constructions being broken in polynomial time thanks to Simon’s period-ﬁnding algorithm. But the practical implications of these attacks remain blurry. In contrast, the results obtained so far for a quantum adversary making classical queries only are less impressive. In this paper, we introduce a new quantum algorithm which uses Simon’s subroutines in a novel way. We manage to leverage the algebraic structure of cryptosystems in the context of a quantum attacker limited to classical queries and oﬄine quantum computations. We obtain improved quantum-time/classical-data tradeoﬀs with respect to the current literature, while using only as much hardware requirements (quantum and classical) as a standard exhaustive search with Grover’s algorithm. In particular, we are able to break the Even-Mansour construction in quantum time ˜ O (2 n/ 3 ), with O (2 n/ 3 ) classical queries and O ( n 2 ) qubits only. In addition, we improve some previous superposition attacks by reducing the data complexity from exponential to polynomial, with the same time complexity.Ourapproach can be seen in two complementary ways: reusing superposition queries during the iteration of a search using Grover’s algorithm, or alternatively, removing the memory requirement in some quantum attacks based on a collision search, thanks to their algebraic structure. We provide a of cryptographic applications, the basic for ﬁnding collisions
papers.abstract_zh: 。在对称密码分析中，叠加查询的模型导致了令人惊讶的结果，由于Simon的周期发现算法，许多构造在多项式时间内被破解。但是这些攻击的实际影响仍然模糊不清。相比之下，到目前为止，量子对手只进行经典查询所获得的结果就不那么令人印象深刻了。本文介绍了一种新的量子算法，它以一种新颖的方式使用了Simon的子程序。我们设法在量子攻击者限于经典查询和oﬄine量子计算的情况下利用密码系统的代数结构。相对于当前文献，我们获得了改进的量子-时间/经典-数据tradeoﬀs，同时仅使用与Grover算法的标准穷举搜索一样多的硬件要求(量子和经典)。特别地，我们能够仅用O (2 n/ 3)个经典查询和O ( n 2)个量子位来打破量子时间\u O(2n/3)中的Even-Mansour构造。此外，我们改进了以前的一些叠加攻击，将数据复杂度从指数级降低到多项式级，时间复杂度不变。我们的方法可以从两个互补的方面来看:在使用Grover算法的搜索迭代过程中重用叠加查询，或者，由于它们的代数结构，在一些基于碰撞搜索的量子攻击中去除了内存需求。我们提供了一系列加密应用，这是发现冲突的基础

papers.title: A Provably Secure Group Signature Scheme from Code-Based Assumptions
papers.authors: Martianus Frederic Ezerman, Hyung Tae Lee, San Ling, Khoa Nguyen, Huaxiong Wang
papers.abstract: We solve an open question in code-based cryptography by introducing two provably secure group signature schemes from code-based assumptions. Our basic scheme satisfies the CPA-anonymity and traceability requirements in the random oracle model, assuming the hardness of the McEliece problem, the Learning Parity with Noise problem, and a variant of the Syndrome Decoding problem. The construction produces smaller key and signature sizes than the previous group signature schemes from lattices, as long as the cardinality of the underlying group does not exceed 224, which is roughly comparable to the current population of the Netherlands. We develop the basic scheme further to achieve the strongest anonymity notion, i.e., CCA-anonymity, with a small overhead in terms of efficiency. The feasibility of two proposed schemes is supported by implementation results. Our two schemes are the first in their respective classes of provably secure groups signature schemes. Additionally, the techniques introduced in this work might be of independent interest. These are a new verifiable encryption protocol for the randomized McEliece encryption and a novel approach to design formal security reductions from the Syndrome Decoding problem.
papers.abstract_zh: 通过引入两个基于代码的可证明安全的群签名方案，我们解决了基于代码的密码学中的一个公开问题。我们的基本方案满足随机预言模型中的CPA-匿名性和可追踪性要求，假设了McEliece问题的困难性、带有噪声的学习奇偶性问题以及伴随式解码问题的一个变体。只要基础群的基数不超过224，这与荷兰当前的人口大致相当，该构造产生了比以前的来自格的群签名方案更小的密钥和签名大小。我们进一步发展了基本方案，以实现最强的匿名概念，即CCA-匿名，在效率方面具有较小的开销。实施结果证实了两种方案的可行性。我们的两个方案在各自的可证明安全的群签名方案中是第一个。此外，这项工作中介绍的技术可能是独立的利益。这是一个新的用于随机化McEliece加密的可验证加密协议，也是一个新的从伴随式解码问题设计形式安全约简的方法。
papers.title_zh: 基于代码假设的可证明安全的群签名方案

papers.title: Coded-BKW with Sieving
papers.authors: Qian Guo, Thomas Johansson, Erik Mårtensson, Paul Stankovski
papers.abstract: The learning with errors problem (LWE) has become a central topic in recent cryptographic research. In this paper, we present a new solving algorithm combining important ideas from previous work on improving the Blum–Kalai–Wasserman (BKW) algorithm and ideas from sieving in lattices. The new algorithm is analyzed and demonstrates an improved asymptotic performance. For the Regev parameters <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$q=n^{2}$ </tex-math></inline-formula> and noise level <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$\sigma = n^{1.5}/(\sqrt {2\pi }\log _{2}^{2}n)$ </tex-math></inline-formula>, the asymptotic complexity is <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$2^{0.893n}$ </tex-math></inline-formula> in the standard setting, improving the previously best known complexity of roughly <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$2^{0.930n}$ </tex-math></inline-formula>. The newly proposed algorithm also provides asymptotic improvements when a quantum computer is assumed or when the number of samples is limited.
papers.abstract_zh: 有错学习问题(LWE)已经成为近年来密码学研究的一个中心话题。在这篇文章中，我们提出了一个新的求解算法，它结合了以前改进布鲁姆-卡雷-乏色曼(BKW)算法的重要思想和网格筛选的思想。对新算法进行了分析，并证明了改进的渐近性能。对于Regev参数< inline-formula > < tex-math notation="latex">$q=n^{2}$ </tex-math > </inline-formula >和噪声级别< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " latex " > $ \ sigma = n^{1.5}/(\sqrt { 2 \ pi } \ log _{2}^{2}n)$ </tex-math > </inline-formula >，在标准设置中，渐近复杂度为< inline-formula > < tex-math notation="latex">$2^{0.893n}$ </tex-math > </inline-formula >，改进了先前已知的复杂度，大致为< inline-formula > < tex-math notation="latex">$2^{0.930n}$ </tex-math >新提出的算法在假设量子计算机或样本数量有限时也提供了渐近改进。

papers.title: When Are Fuzzy Extractors Possible?
papers.authors: Benjamin Fuller, Leonid Reyzin, Adam D. Smith
papers.abstract: Fuzzy extractors (Dodis et al., SIAM J. Computing 2008) convert repeated noisy readings of a high-entropy secret into the same uniformly distributed key. A minimum condition for the security of the key is the hardness of guessing a value that is similar to the secret, because the fuzzy extractor converts such a guess to the key. We quantify this property in a new notion called <italic>fuzzy min-entropy</italic>. We ask: is fuzzy min-entropy sufficient to build fuzzy extractors? We provide two answers for different settings. 1) If the construction is provided a description of the probability distribution <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$W$ </tex-math></inline-formula> that defines the noisy source then fuzzy min-entropy is a sufficient condition for information-theoretic key extraction from <inline-formula> <tex-math notation="LaTeX">$W$ </tex-math></inline-formula>. 2) A more ambitious goal is to design a single extractor that works for all possible sources. This more ambitious goal is impossible: there is a family of sources with high fuzzy min-entropy for which no single fuzzy extractor is secure. This is true in three settings: a) for standard fuzzy extractors, b) for fuzzy extractors that are allowed to sometimes be wrong, c) and for secure sketches, which are the main ingredient of most fuzzy extractor constructions.
papers.abstract_zh: 模糊提取器(Dodis等人，SIAM J. Computing 2008)将高熵秘密的重复噪声读数转换为相同的均匀分布密钥。密钥安全性的最低条件是猜测与秘密相似的值的难度，因为模糊提取器将这种猜测转换为密钥。我们用一个叫做< italic >模糊最小熵</italic >的新概念来量化这个性质。我们问:模糊最小熵是否足以建立模糊提取器？我们针对不同的设置提供了两种答案。1)如果构造提供了定义噪声源的概率分布的描述，则模糊最小熵是从< inline-formula > < tex-math notation = " LaTeX " > $ W $ </tex-math > </inline-formula >中提取信息论关键字的充分条件。2)更远大的目标是设计一种适用于所有可能来源的单一提取器。这个更雄心勃勃的目标是不可能的:有一个家庭的来源与高模糊最小熵，没有一个单一的模糊提取器是安全的。这在三种情况下是正确的:a)对于标准的模糊提取器，b)对于有时可能出错的模糊提取器，c)对于安全草图，这是大多数模糊提取器构造的主要成分。
papers.title_zh: 什么时候模糊提取器成为可能？
